metadata.title: CVE-2018-9518 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In nfc_llcp_build_sdreq_tlv of llcp_commands.c, there is a possible out ofbounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions:Android kernel. Android ID: A-73083945.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-9518` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-34-generic - 4.15.0-34.37
linux-image-4.15.0-34-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-34.37
linux-image-4.15.0-34-lowlatency - 4.15.0-34.37
linux-image-4.15.0-34-snapdragon - 4.15.0-34.37
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-34-generic - 4.15.0-34.37
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-34-lowlatency - 4.15.0-34.37
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1022-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1022.24
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1021-aws - 4.15.0-1021.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1019-gcp - 4.15.0-1019.20
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1021-kvm - 4.15.0-1021.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1018-oem - 4.15.0-1018.21
No subscription required
